title: Chicken beetroot and potato salad
ingredients: ['6 large baking potatoes, peeled and cubed', '4 carrots, diced', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '425g cooked chicken, diced', '6 hard-boiled eggs, peeled and chopped', '2 dill pickled cucumbers, chopped', '2 tablespoons dill pickle brine', '500ml mayonnaise', 'salt and pepper to taste', '170g cooked beetroot, diced']
